subject: Order # SSN5213
description_text:
Good afternoon,

I am reaching out to inquire about my order number SSN5213.   I placed the
order on December 23rd.  Do you have any details on when the item may be
arriving?   It is a shifter for my grandson.   I do not have any tracking
information as of yet.  Has it been shipped yet?  If not, do you have any
details regarding my order?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.  Thank you for your time and
attention in this matter.

Have a wonderful weekend!

Dorinda Thompson, LMSW

conversations.body_text: Hi Dorinda Thompson,  Your order has already been shipped. You can track the shipment using the tracking number.Â
